column2: an A.M. Eatery////Hmmm where to even start.  I've been to the original in Colorado
column3: so I already know that they have great food.  This review is on their service and atmosphere.  Let's just say that it was superb for us.  Our waiter Darius was very attentive and although he had a multitude of tables to serve
column4: he was able to get this to us In a timely manner.  Lots of other waiters came to check in is also.  Granted
column5: we had a cute baby with a snooze onesie on
